name: Dismiss
tagline: DISMISS is an R script, which as an additional step in MeDIP-Seq data analysis workflow, enables the allocation of strands to methylated DNA regions. It does this by analyzing the proportions of first mate reads aligning to the methylated locus from the plus and minus strands.
body:
# dismiss
DISMISS is an R script, which as an additional step in MeDIP-Seq data analysis workflow, enables the allocation of strands to methylated DNA regions. It does this by analyzing the proportions of first mate reads aligning to the methylated locus from the plus and minus strands.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
